description: Triangular array T read by rows: T(u,v)=LCM(u,v).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..120 of triangle, flattened
Keith Bourque, Steve Ligh, Matrices associated with multiplicative functions, Lin. Alg. Applic. 216 (1995) 265-275
Shaofang Hong, Raphael Loewy, Asymptotic behavior of eigenvalues of greatest common divisor matrices, Glasgow Math. J. 46 (2004) 551-569
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Least Common Multiple
Index entries for sequences related to lcm's
formula: T(n,1) = T(n,n) = n. T(n,2) = A109043(n). - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 07 2011T(n,k) = A075362(n,k)/A050873(n,k), 1<=k<=n. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 25 2011T(n,k) = A051537(n,k) * A050873(n,k). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 07 2013
maple: A051173 := proc(u,v) ilcm(u,v) ; end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 07 2011
prog: (Haskell)a051173 = lcma051173_row n = a051173_tabl !! (n-1)a051173_tabl = map (\x -> map (lcm x) [1..x]) [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 13 2013, Jul 07 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
